sections.text: anuvAkaM-1

BadraM karṇEBiḥ̍ śRuṇuyAma# dEvAḥ|BadraM paśyEmAkṣaBir̍ yajatrAḥ|sthiraira~ggai̱stuṣṭuvAṃ̍ sastanUBi̍ḥ|vyaśE̍ma̍ dEvahitaM̍ ~MyadAyuḥ||svasti̍ na indrO# vRuddhaśravAḥ|svasti̍ naḥ̍ pUṣA viśvavEdAḥ|svasti̍ nastArkṣyO ariṣṭanEmiḥ|svasti̍ nO bRuhaspatir-dadhAtu||Apa̍mApAmapaḥ̍ sarvA̱ḥ|asmA-dasmA-ditO&mutaḥ|1̍ (10)

agnirvAyuśca sUryaśca|saha̍ sa~jca-skararddhi̍yA||vAyvaśvA̍# raśmipatayaḥ|marI̱cyAtmAnO̍ adruhaḥ|dEvIr̍ Buvana̍ sUvarIḥ|putravattvAya̍# mE suta||mahAnAmnIr-mahAmAnAḥ|mahasO̍ mahasaḥ̍ svaḥ|dEvIḥ̍ parjanya̍ sUvarIḥ|putravattvAya̍# mE suta

apAśnyuṣṇi-mapA̍ rakṣaḥ|apAśnyu̍ṣṇi-mapA̍ raGa̱M|apA̱GrAmapa# cAvarti̱M|apa# dEvIritO hita||vajra̍M̍ dEvIrajItAṅśca|Buva̍naM̍ dEvasUvarIḥ|AdityAnadi̍tiM̍ dEvIM|yOninOrddhva-mudIṣa̍ta||śivA̍ naḥ śantamA̍ Bavantu|divyA Apa Oṣadhayaḥ(̍ )|sumRuḍIkA sarasvati|mA̍ tE vyOma̍ sandRuśi||3̍ (12)
anuvAkaM-2

smRutiḥ̍ pratyakṣa-maitihya̱M|anu̍mAna-ścatuṣṭayaM|EtairAdi̍tya̍ maṇḍalaM|sarvairEva̍ vidhA̱syatE||sUryO marIcimAda̍ttE|sarvasmA̱d̍ BuvanAdadhi|tasyAḥ̍ pAka viśEṣEṇa|smRutaM̍ kAla̍ viśEṣaṇaM||nadIva̍ praBavAt̍ kAcit|akṣayyA̱th syandatE yathA|4̍ (10)

tAnnadyO&Bi samAyanti|sOruḥ̍ satI# na nivartatE||EvannAnA̍ samutthAnAḥ|kAlAḥ̍ sam~Mvathsaraṅ̍ śritAḥ|aṇuśaśca̍ mahaśaśca|sarvE̍# samavayantri# taM||sa tai̱ḥ sarvaiḥ samAviṣṭaḥ|Uruḥ̍ sanna̍ nivartatE|adhi̍ sam~MvathsaraM̍ ~MvidyAt|tadEva# lakṣaṇE

aṇuBiśca mahadBiśca|samArU̍ḍhaḥ̍ pradRuśyatE|sam~Mvathsaraḥ̍ pratyakṣEṇa|nAdhisa̍ttvaḥ̍ pradRuśyatE||paṭarO̍# viklidhaḥ̍ pi~ggaḥ|Etad varuṇa̍ lakṣaṇaM|yatraita̍-dupadRuśya̍tE|sahasra̍M̍ tatra nIyatE||Ekaṃ̍ hi śirO nAnA̍ muKE|kRuthsnaM tadRuta̍ lakṣaṇaM|6̍ (10)

uBayataḥ saptE̱ndriyAṇi|jalpitaM̍ tvEva dihyatE||śuklakRuṣṇE̍ sam~Mvathsarasya|dakṣiṇa̍ vAmayOḥ̍ pArśvayOḥ|tasyaiṣA Bavati||śukraM̍ tE# anyadyajataM̍ tE# anyat|viṣurUpE̍ ahanI̍ dyaurivAsi|viśvA̍ hi mAyA avasi̍ svadhAvaḥ|BadrA tE# pUṣanniha rAtirastviti||nAtra̍ BuvanaM̍ ( )|na pUṣA|na paśavaḥ|nAdityaḥ̍ sam~Mvathsara Eva pratyakṣEṇa priyatamaM̍ ~MvidyAt|Etadvai sam~Mvathsarasya priyatamaṃ̍ rUpaM|yO&sya mahAnartha utpathsyamAnO̍ Bavati|idaM puṇyaM kuruṣvEti|tamAhara̍ṇaM̍ dadyAt||7 (17) (yathA - lakṣaṇa - Rutulakṣa̍ṇaM̍ - Buvanaṃ̍ sapta ca# (A2)
anuvAkaM-3

sAka~jjAnAṃ# saptathamAhu-rEkajaM|ṣaḍu̍dyamA̍ RuṣayO̍ dEvajA iti|tEṣA̍miṣṭAni̍ vihitAni̍ dhAmaśaḥ|sthAtrE rEjantE̍ vikRutAni̍ rUpaśaḥ||kOnu# maryA amithitaḥ|saKA̍ saKAyamabravIt|jahA̍kO̍ asmadIṣatE||yastityAja̍# saKividaṃq saKAyaM|na̍ tasya# vAcyapi# BAgO asti|yadIṃ̍# śRuṇOtyalakaṃ# śRuṇOti|8 (10)

na hi pravEda# sukRutasya panthAmiti||Rutuṛ̍ RutunA̍ nudyamAnaḥ|vina̍nAdABidhA̍vaḥ|ṣaṣṭiśca̍ triṃśakA̍ valgAḥ|śuklakRuṣṇau̍ ca ṣAṣṭikau||sArAgavastrair-jarada̍kṣaḥ|vasantO̍ vasuBiḥ̍ saha|sam~Mvathsarasya# savituḥ|praiṣakRut prathamaḥ̍ smRutaḥ||amUnAdaya̍-tEtyanyAn|9̍ (10)

amUṅśca# parirakṣataḥ|EtA̍ vAcaḥ prayujyantE|yatrai̍ tadupadRuśya̍tE||EtadEva̍ vijAnIyAt|pramAṇa̍M̍ kAlaparyayE|viśEṣaṇaM̍ tu# vakṣyAmaḥ|RutUnA̱M tannibOdhata||śuklavAsA̍# rudragaṇaḥ|grIṣmEṇAvartatE̍ saha|nijaha̍n̍ pRuthivIṃ̍ sarvAM|10 (10)

jyOtiṣA̱ &pratiKyEna# saḥ||viśvarUpAṇi# vAsAṃqsi|AdityAnA̱M nibOdhata|sam~MvathsarIṇa̍M̍ karmaPalaM|vaṛṣABir dadatAṃq̍ saha||aduḥKO# duḥKa cakṣuriva|tadmA̍# pIta iva dRuśyatE|śItEnA̱̍ vyathayanniva|ruruda̍kṣa̍ iva dRuśyatE||hlAdayatE̱̍ jvalataścaiva̍ ( )|śAmyataścAsya̍ cakṣuṣI|yAvai̍ prajA BraṅśyantE|sam~MvathsarAttA̍ BraṅśyantE||yAḥ̍ pratitiṣṭhanti|saM~MvathsarE̍ tAḥ pratitiṣṭhanti|vaqrq.ṣABya̍# ityarthaḥ
anuvAkaM-4

akṣiduḥKOtthi̍tasyaiva|viprasa̍nnE̍ kanInikE|A~gktE̍ cAdgaṇaM̍ nAsti|RuBUṇA̱M tannibOdhata||kanakABAni̍# vAsAṃqsi|ahatAni̍ nibOdhata|annamaśrnIta̍# mRujmIta|ahaM ~MvO# jIvanapradaḥ||EtA̍ vAcaḥ prayujyantE|śaradya̍trOpa̍ dRuśyatE|12̍ (10)

aBidhUnvantO-&BiGnanta̍ iva|vAtavantO̍ marudgaṇAḥ||amutO̍ jEtumiṣumuKamiva|sannaddhAḥ̍ saha dadRuśE̍ ha|apaddhvastair-vastivarṇairiva|viśiKAsa̍ḥ̍ kapardinaḥ||akruddhasya yOthsyamAnasya|kRuddhasyE̍va̍ lOhinI|hEmataścakṣu̍ṣI̍ vidyAt|akṣṇayO̱ḥ kṣipaṇOriva||13̍ (10)

durBikṣaM dEvalOkEṣu|manUnA̍mudakaM̍ gRuhE|EtA̍ vAcaḥ pravadantIḥ|vaidyutO̍# yAnti śaiśirIḥ||tA̍ agniḥ pavamAnA̍ anvai̱kṣata|iha jIvikAma-pa̍ripaśyann|tasyaiṣA̍ Bavati||ihEha̍ vaḥ̍ svatapasaḥ|marutaḥ̍ sUryatvacaḥ|śarma̍# saprathA AvRuṇE̍ ( )
anuvAkaM-5

ati# tAmrAṇi# vAsAṃqsi|aṣṭivajri̍ śataGni# ca|viśvE dEvA vipraharanti|agniji̍hva̍ asaścata||naiva̍ dEvO# na martyaḥ|na rAjA varuṇO̍ viBuḥ|nAgnir nEndrO na pavamAnaḥ|mAtRukka̍cca̍ na vidyatE||divyasyaikA̍ dhanurArtniḥ|pRuthivyAmapa̍rA̍ śritA|15 (10)

tasyEndrO vamrirUpEṇa|dhanurjyA̍-maCinathsva̍yaM||tadi̍ndradhanu̍rityajyaM|aBrava̍rṇEṣu̍ cakṣatE|EtadEva̍ śam~MyOr-bAṛhaspatyasya|Etad̍ rudrasya̍ dhanuḥ||rudrasya# tvEva dhanurArtniḥ|śira̍ utpipEṣa|sa̍ pravargyO̍&Bavat|tasmAd̍ yaḥ sapravargyEṇa̍# yajñEna yajatE̍ ( )|rudrasya sa śiraḥ pratidadhAti|nainaṃ̍# rudra ArukO̍ Bavati|ya EvaM ~MvEda||16̍ (13)
anuvAkaM-6

atyUrddhvAkṣO&tiraścAt|śiśi̍raḥ̍ pradRuśyatE|naiva̍ rUpaM na# vAsAṃqsi|na cakṣuḥ̍ pratidRuśyatE||anyOnyaM̍ tu na# hiṅsrAtaḥ|sata stad̍ dEvalakṣaṇaM|lOhitO&kṣṇi̍ śAraśIrṣṇiḥ|sUryasyO̍dayanaM̍ prati||tvaM̍ karOṣi# nya~jjalikAM|tvaM karOṣi̍ nijAnukAM|17̍ (10)

nijAnukAmE̱ nya~jjalikA|amI vAca-mupAsatAmiti||tasmai̍ sarva RutavO# namantE|maryAdA karatvAt prapurOdhAM|brAhmaṇa̍# ApnOti|ya EvaM̍ ~MvEda|sa Kalu sam~Mvathsara Etaiḥ sEnAnIBiḥ̍ saha|indrAya sarvAn-kAmAnaBivahati|sa̍ draqPsaḥ|tasyaiṣA Bavati||18̍ (10)

ava# draPsO aṃśamatI̍matiṣṭhat|iyAnaḥ̍ kRuṣṇO daśaBiḥ̍ sahasrai̱ḥ|Avarta-mindraḥ śacyA dhamantaM|upasnuhi̍ taM nRumaṇA-mathadrAmiti||Etayai̍ vEndraḥ salA vRukyA̍ saha|asurAn parivRuścati|pRuthi̍vyaṃq̍ śumatI|tAmanva-va̍sthitaḥ̍ sam~MvathsarO diva~jca|naivaM̍ ~MviduṣA-&&cAryA̱n tEvAsinau|anyOnyasmai̱ druhyAtAM ( )|yO druhyati|BraśyatE svargAl̍ lOkAt|ityatu maṇḍalAni|sUrya̍ maṇḍalA̱ nyAKyAyikAḥ|ata UrddhvaṃsanirvacanAḥ||19̍ (15)
anuvAkaM-7

ArOgO BrAjaḥ paṭaraḥ̍ pata~ggaḥ|svarṇarO jyOtiṣImAn.̍ viBAsaḥ|tE asmai sarvE divamAtapanti|UrjaM̍ duhAnA anapasPuranta̍ iti||kaśyapO&ṣṭamaḥ|sa̍ mahAmEruM na# jahAti|tasyaiṣA Bavati||yattE̍ śilpaM̍ kaśyapa rOcanAvat|indriyAva̍t̍ puṣkalaM citraBAnu|yasmin̍ thsUryA arpitAḥ̍ sapta sAkaM|20 (10)

tasmin rAjAna-madhiviśrayEmamiti||tE̍ asmai sarvE kaśyapA-jjyOtir̍ -laBantE|tAnthsOmaḥ kaśyapAdadhi# nirddhamati|BrastA karma kRudivaivaM||prAṇO̍ jIvAnIndriya# jIvAni|sapta śIṛṣaṇyAḥ̍ prAṇAḥ|sUryA ityAcAryAḥ||apaśyamaha̍ mEtAnth sapta sU̱ryAniti|pa~jcakarṇO# vAthsyAyanaḥ|saptakarṇaśca̍ plAkṣiḥ|21 (10)

Anuśravika Eva nau kaśyapa̍ iti|uBau# vEdayitE|na hi śEkumiva mahAmEruM̍ gantuM||apaśyamahamEtath sUryamaṇḍalaM parivartamAnaM|gArgyaḥ̍ prAṇatrAtaḥ|gacCanta̍ mahAmEruM|Eka̍~jcAjahataM||BrAjapaṭara̍ pata~ggA̍ nihanE|tiṣṭhannAtapanti|tasmA̍diha̍ taptri# tapAḥ|22 (10)

amutrEtarE|tasmAdihA̍ taptri# tapAḥ||tEṣAmEṣA̍ Bavati||sapta̍ sUryA diva-manu praviṣṭAḥ|tAnanvEti̍# pathiBir̍ dakṣiṇAvAn|tE̍ asmai sarvE GRutamAtapanti|UrjaM̍ duhAnA anapasPuranta̍ iti||saptartvijaḥ sUryA ityAcAryAḥ||tEṣA̍mEṣA̍ Bavati||sapta̍ diśO nAnA# sUryAḥ|23 (10)

sapta hOtAra̍ Rutvijaḥ|dEvA̍ AdityA# yE sapta|tEBiḥ sOmABI rakṣaṇa̍ iti||tadapyAmnAyaḥ|digBrAja̍ RutU̱n karOti||EtayaivAvRutA̍ &&sahasrasUryatAyA iti vaiśampAyanaḥ||tasyaiṣA̍ Bavati||yaddyAva̍# indra tE śataṃ śataM BUmI̱ḥ|uta syuḥ|na tvA# vajrinth sahasraṃq sUryA̱ḥ ( )|24 (10)

anu na jAtamaṣṭa rOdasI̍ iti||nAnA li~ggatvA-dRutUnAM nAnA# sUryatvaM||aṣṭau tu vyavasitA̍ iti||sUryamaṇḍalA-nyaṣṭAta̍ UrddhvaM||tEṣAmEṣA̍ Bavati||citraM̍ dEvAnA-mudagAdanI̍kaM|cakṣu̍r̍ mitrasya varuṇasyAgnEḥ|A&prA̍ dyAvA# pRuthivI antarikṣaM|sUrya̍ AtmA jagatastasthuṣaścEti||25̍ (9)
anuvAkaM-8

kvEdamaBraM̍ niviśatE|kvAyaṃ# sam~MvathsarO mithaḥ|kvAhaḥ̍ kvEyan dEva̍ rAtrI|kva mAsA Rutavaḥ̍ śritAḥ||arddhamAsA# muhUrtAḥ|nimEṣAstuṭiBiḥ̍ (nimEṣAstraṭiBiḥ)̍ saha|kvEmA ApO niviśantE|yadItO̍# yAnti saMprati||kAlA̍ aPsu niviśantE|Apaḥ̍ sUryE# samAhitAḥ|26̍ (10)

aBrA̱ṇyapaḥ prapadyantE|vidyuthsUryE̍# samAhitA||anavarṇE̍ imE̍ BUmI|iya~jcAsau̍ ca rOdasI||kiṅ̍ svidatrAntarA̍ BUtaM|yEnEmE vidhRutE̍ uBE|viṣṇunA# vidhRutE̍ BUmI|iti vathsasya̍ vEdanA||irA̍vatI̍ dhEnumatI hi BUtaM|sUyavasinI manuṣE̍ daśasyE̱|27 (10)

vyaṣṭaBnA-drOda̍sI̍ viṣṇavEtE|dAdhartha̍# pRuthivI-maBitO# mayUKai̱ḥ||kinta-dviṣṇO rbalamAhuḥ|kA̍ dIptiḥ̍ kiM parAyaṇaM|EkO̍# yaddhA-raya̍ ddEvaḥ|rEjatI# rOdasI uBE||vAtAdviṣṇOr̍ bala̍ mAhuḥ|akṣarA̱d dIpti rucyatE|tripadAddhAra̍yad̍ dEvaḥ|yadviṣṇOrEka-mutta̍maM||28̍ (10)

(pagE 40) agnayO# vAyavaścaiva|Etada̍sya̍ parAyaṇaM||pRucCAmi̍ tvA paraM̍ mRutyuM|avamaM̍ maddhyama~jcatuM|lOka~jca̍ puṇyapApAnAM|Etat̍ pRucCAmi̍ saMprati||amumA̍huḥ̍ paraM̍ mRutyuM|pavamAnaM̍ tu maddhyamaM|agnirEvAva̍mO̍ mRutyuḥ|candramA̱-ścaturucyatE||29̍ (10)

anABOgAḥ paraM̍ mRutyuM|pApAḥ sam~Myanti̍ sarvadA|ABOgAstvEva̍# sam~Myanti|yatra puṇyakRutO̍ janAḥ||tatO̍# maddhyamamAyanti|catuma̍gni~jca̍ saMprati||pRucCAmi̍ tvA# pApakRutaḥ|yatra yAtayatE̍ yamaḥ|tvannastad̍ -brahman̍ prabrUhi|yadi vE̱tthA&satO gRuhAn||30̍ (10)

kaśyapA# duditAḥ̍ sUryAḥ|pApAnnirGnanti̍ sarvadA|rOdasyOranta̍r̍ dEśEṣu|tatra nyasyantE# vAsavaiḥ||tE &śarIrAḥ prapadyantE|yathA̍ &puṇyasya̍ karmaṇaḥ|apA̱ṇyapAda̍# kEśAsaḥ|tatra tE&yOnijA̍ janAḥ||mRutvA̍ punarmRutyu-mApadyantE|adyamA̍nAḥ̍ svakarmaBiḥ|31̍ (10)

AśAtikAḥ krimaya̍ iva|tataḥ pUyantE# vAsavaiḥ||apaitaM̍ mRutyuM jayati|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda|sa̍ KalvaivaM̍ ~MvidbrAhmaṇaḥ|dIrGaśruttamO̍ Bavati|kaśya̍pasyAti̍thiḥ̍ siddhagamanaḥ̍ siddhAgamanaḥ||tasyaiṣA̍ Bavati||Ayasmina̱-thsapta̍ vAsavAḥ|rOha̍nti̍ pUrvyA# ruhaḥ|32̍ (10)

Ruṣiṛha̍ dIrGaśruttamaḥ|indrasya̍ GarmO atithiriti||kaśyapaḥ̍ paśyakO̍ Bavati|yathsarvaM paripaśyatIti̍ saukṣmyAt||athAgnEraṣṭapu̍ruṣasya|tasyaiṣA̍ Bavati||agnE̍ naya# supathA# rAyE asmAn|viśvAni̍ dEva vayunAni̍ vidvAn|yuyOddhyasma-jju̍hurAṇamEna̍ḥ|BUyiṣṭhAntE̍ nama uktiM ~MvidhEmEti̍ ( )||33 (10) samAhitA̍ - daśasyE# - uttama-mucya̍tE-gRuhAn-thsvakarma̍Biḥ-pUrvyA̍# ruha-iti)̍ (A8)
anuvAkaM-9

agniśca jAtavEdAśca|sahOjA̍ ajirApraBuḥ|vaiśvAnarO̍ naryApAśca|pa~gktirA̍dhAśca̍ saptamaḥ|visarpE̍ vAṣṭamO&gnInAM|EtE&ṣṭau̍ vasavaḥ kṣitA̍ iti||yathartvE-vAgnE-rarcirvarṇa# viśEṣAḥ|nIlArciśca pItakA̱rciścEti||atha vAyO-rEkAdaśa-puruṣasyaikAdaśastrIkasya||praBrAjamAnA̍ vyavadAtAḥ|34̍ (10)

yAśca vAsuki̍ vaidyutAḥ|rajatAḥ paruṣAḥ̍ śyAmAḥ|kapilA atilOhitAḥ|UrddhvA̍ avapatantAśca|vaidyuta̍ ityEkAdaśa||nainaM̍ ~MvaidyutO# hinasti|ya EvaM̍ ~MvEda||sa hOvAca vyAsaḥ pArAśaryaḥ|vidyudvadhamEvAhaM̍ mRutyumai̱cCamiti||na tvakAmaṃ̍ hanti|35 (10)

ya EvaM̍ ~MvEda||atha gandharvagaṇAḥ|svAna̍ BrAṭ|a~gGArir̍ baMBAriḥ|hastaḥ̍ suhastaḥ|kRuśA̍nur̍ viśvAvasuḥ|mUrddhanvAnth-sU̱ryavarcAḥ|kRutirityEkAdaśa̍ gandharvagaṇAḥ||dEvAśca̍ mahAdEvAḥ|raśmayaśca̍ dEvA# garagiraḥ

nainaM garO# hinasti|ya EvaM̍ ~MvEda||gaurI mimAya̍ salilAni takṣatI|Eka̍padI̍ dvipadI sA catuṣpadI|aṣṭApa̍dI̍ navapadI̍ baBUvuṣI̱|sahasrAkṣarA paramE vyOmanniti||vAcO̍# viśEṣaṇaM||atha nigadavyAKyAtAḥ|tAnanukra̍miṣyAmaḥ||varAhava̍ḥ-svatapasaḥ|37̍ (10)

vidyun mahasO̍ dhUpayaḥ|śvApayO̍ gRuhamEdhA̱ścEtyEtE|yE cEmE&śimividviṣaḥ||parjanyAḥ̍ sapta pRuthivImaBivaṛṣanti|vRuṣṭi̍Biriti|Etayaiva̍ viBakti viparItAḥ|saptaBirvAtai̍# rudIritAḥ|amUM ~MlOkA-naBivaṛṣanti|tEṣA̍mEṣA̍ Bavati||samAna-mEtaduda̍kaM|38̍ (10)

uccaityava̍ cAhaBiḥ|BUmi̍M̍ parjanyA jinvanti|divaM̍ jinvan-tyagnaya̍ iti||yadakṣaraM̍ BUtakRutaM|viśvE̍# dEvA upAsatE|mahaṛṣi̍masya̍ gOptAra̱M|jamadagni-maku̍rvata||jamada̍gni-rApyA̍yatE|CandO̍Bi-ścaturuttaraiḥ|rAjñaḥ̍ sOmasya̍ tRuptAsaḥ|39̍ (10)

brahmaṇA̍ vIryAvatA|śivA̍ naḥ̍ pradiśO diśaḥ||tacCa~MyyOrA̍ vRuṇImahE|gAtuM̍ ~MyajñAya|gAtuM̍ ~MyajñapatayE|daivI̱̍ svastirastu̍ naḥ|svastir mAnuṣEByaḥ|UrddhvaM̍ jigAtu̍ BEṣajaM|śannO# astu dvipadE̱|śa~jcatuṣpadE̍ ( )||sOmapA(3) asOmapA(3) iti nigadavyAKyAtAḥ||40̍ (11)
anuvAkaM-10

sahasravRudiyaM̍ BUmiḥ|paraM ~MvyOma̍ sahasravRut|aśvinA̍# BujyU# nAsatyA|viśvasya# jagataspatI||jAyA̍ BUmiḥ patirvyOma|mithuna̍ntA̍ aturyathuḥ|putrO̍ bRuhaspatI̍ rudraḥ|saramA# iti# strIpumaM||śukraM ~MvAmanyadya̍jataM̍ ~MvAmanyat|viṣu̍rUpE̍ ahanI̍ dyauriva̍ sthaḥ|41 (10)
